interface.name: squid_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute squid in the squid domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: squid_manage_logs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete squid logs.

interface.name: squid_use
interface.summary: Use squid services by connecting over TCP. (Deprecated)

desc.p: Allow squid to connect to all ports, not just HTTP, FTP, and Gopher ports.
